battle_log_formatter.description: Formats a battle outcome into a standardized string for easy logging in the notepad.
battle_log_formatter.python_script:
effectiveness_map = {"super effective": ">", "not very effective": "!>", "no effect": "x>"}
symbol = effectiveness_map[input_data["effectiveness"]]
defender_type2_str = f'/{input_data["defender_type2"]}' if input_data.get("defender_type2") else ""
log_entry = f'- {input_data["attacker_type"]} {symbol} {input_data["defender_type1"]}{defender_type2_str}'
print(log_entry)

get_impassable_tiles.description: Extracts and returns a JSON list of all impassable tile coordinates from the current map XML.
get_impassable_tiles.python_script: import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET; import json; root = ET.fromstring(map_xml_string); impassable_tiles = []; for row_elem in root.findall('Row'): y = int(row_elem.get('id')); for tile_elem in row_elem.findall('Tile'): x = int(tile_elem.get('id')); if tile_elem.get('type') == 'impassable' or tile_elem.find('Object') is not None: impassable_tiles.append({'x': x, 'y': y}); print(json.dumps(impassable_tiles))
